name: phog-v10
description: Physics-Governed Receipt Engine - Execute and verify physics laws

scripts.couple: npx tsx examples/hot_ball_falling.ts && npx tsx examples/enzyme_reaction.ts
scripts.rings: npx tsx examples/hot_ball_rings.ts && npx tsx examples/enzyme_rings.ts
scripts.spatial: npx tsx examples/heat_1d.ts && npx tsx examples/genome_1d.ts
scripts.water: npx tsx examples/water_memory.ts && npx tsx examples/memory_persistence.ts
scripts.water-genome: npx tsx examples/water_genome_control.ts && npx tsx examples/water_genome_c30.ts && npx tsx examples/water_genome_temperature.ts
scripts.spatial2d: npx tsx examples/heat_2d.ts && npx tsx examples/stirred_beaker.ts
scripts.em: npx tsx examples/light_pulse.ts && npx tsx examples/dna_biophoton.ts

author: PHOG Team
